sentences.english: Consumption rate is an important macroeconomic index used to reflect economic condition.
sentences.chinese: 消費率是反映國民經濟運行狀況的重要宏觀經濟指標。

sentences.english: The premium rate of disproportional reinsurance by bilateral party agreed.
sentences.chinese: 非比例再保險的保險費率由雙方當事人議定。

sentences.english: This kind of insurance charge will be according to the cargo.
sentences.chinese: 這類險別的保險費率將根據貨物種類而定。

sentences.english: Parcels over 70 pounds require overscald rates.
sentences.chinese: 包裹超過七十磅重須付超重費率。

sentences.english: Each account can be set up independently rates.
sentences.chinese: 每個帳戶可獨立設置費率標準。

sentences.english: If the cable is urgent, the rate will be doubled.
sentences.chinese: 如果是加急電報，費率加倍。

sentences.english: But market freight rates had tumbled to under $20 a ton.
sentences.chinese: 而市場航運費率已經跌至不足每噸20美元。

sentences.english: Investment rate curve resemble an inverted "U" and consumption rate curve resemble an "U".
sentences.chinese: 消費率演變過程則呈現與投資率相反的“U”型曲線。

sentences.english: Please give us the policy rates for FPA coverage and for WPA coverage.
sentences.chinese: 請告訴我們平安險和水漬險的保險費率。

sentences.english: A couple of suggestions were put forward based on the key parameters of rate models for toll-by-weight road.
sentences.chinese: 並結合計重費率計算模型的關鍵參數提出了幾點建議。

sentences.english: Insurance rate of this sort is contingent to the cargo classes.
sentences.chinese: 這類險別的保險費率將根據貨物種類而定。

sentences.english: The rate of insurance of this kind vary to the class of the cargo.
sentences.chinese: 這類險別的保險費率將根據貨物種類而定。

sentences.english: Raising your deductibles is the easiest way to reduce your rates.
sentences.chinese: 提高您的免賠額是最簡單的方法，以減少您的費率。

sentences.english: parcels over 70 pounds require oversized rates.
sentences.chinese: 包裹超過70磅重需要付超重費率。

sentences.english: There are also different price tiers depending on how much storage per user is needed.
sentences.chinese: 根據每個用戶需要的存儲量不同，有不同的費率。

sentences.english: Could you find out the premium rate for porcelain？
sentences.chinese: 您能查一下瓷器的保險費率嗎？

definition: life insurance/abbr. for 人壽保險|人寿保险
to pay/to hand over (tax payment etc)
public/publicly (owned, financed, operated etc)/run by the state
